  • Constructor Details

    • MixedFraction

      public MixedFraction()
      This is a default Constructor in creating a Mixed Fraction Object

    • MixedFraction

      public MixedFraction(int whole, Fraction fraction)
      This is a parameterized Constructor in creating a Mixed Fraction Object This constructor is called when passing a Fraction object
      Parameters:
      whole - this parameter will be the wholeNumber of the Mixed Fraction
      fraction - this parameter will be set as the fraction part of the Mixed Fraction

    • MixedFraction

      public MixedFraction(int whole, int numerator, int denominator)
      This is a parameterized Constructor in creating a Mixed Fraction Object This constructor is called when passing a Fraction object
      Parameters:
      whole - this parameter will be the wholeNumber of the Mixed Fraction
      numerator - this parameter will be set as the Numerator of the Mixed Fraction
      denominator - this parameter will be set as the denominator of the Mixed Fraction

    • MixedFraction

      public MixedFraction(Fraction fraction)
      This is a parameterized Constructor in creating a Mixed Fraction Object This constructor is called when passing a Fraction object
      Parameters:
      fraction - this parameter will be the basis Fraction of the Mixed Fraction and the whole number is set as 0

  • Method Details

    • setWholePart

      public void setWholePart(int whole)
      this method sets the whole number part of the mixed fraction

    • setFractionPart

      public void setFractionPart(Fraction fraction)
      this method sets the fraction part of the mixed fraction

    • getWhole

      public int getWhole()
      this method gets the value of the whole number part of the mixed fraction

    • getFractionPart

      public Fraction getFractionPart()
      this method gets the value of the numerator and denominator which returns it as a fraction

    • add

      public MixedFraction add(MixedFraction other)
      This method adds up Mixed Fractions. If the fraction part of the result is improper, make it Mixed Fractions, and it's whole num will be added to the result's whole num. Returns Mixed Fractions
      Parameters:
      other - this MixedFraction object represents the value of the second fraction that will be added to the first fraction
      Returns:
      returns the sum of the two mixed fractions in reduced form using the reduceFraction method

    • subtract

      public MixedFraction subtract(MixedFraction other)
      This method Subtracts Mixed Fractions. If the fraction part of the result is improper, make it Mixed Fractions, and it's whole num will be added to the result's whole num. Returns Mixed Fractions
      Parameters:
      other - this MixedFraction object represents the value of the second fraction that will be subtracted from to the first fraction
      Returns:
      returns the difference of the two mixed fractions in reduced form using the reduceFraction method

    • multiplyBy

      public MixedFraction multiplyBy(MixedFraction other)
      This method Multiplies Mixed Fractions. First, convert mixed fractions to improper faction. If the fraction part of the result is improper, make it Mixed Fractions and its quotient will be the whole number. Returns Mixed Fractions
      Parameters:
      other - this MixedFraction object which represents the value of the second fraction that will be multiplied to the first fraction
      Returns:
      returns the product of the two mixed fractions in reduced form using the reduceFraction method

    • divideBy

      public MixedFraction divideBy(MixedFraction other)
      This method Multiplies Mixed Fractions. First, convert mixed fractions to improper faction. If the fraction part of the result is improper, make it Mixed Fractions and its quotient will be the whole number. Returns Mixed Fractions
      Parameters:
      other - this MixedFraction object which represents the value of the second fraction that will be divided from the first fraction
      Returns:
      returns the quotient of the two mixed fractions in reduced form using the reduceFraction method
